Text: RE BHP Copper Inc Cc Jason Fyi Im not in the office this week Vacation We just hired a member of the BHP metals team in New York His name is Bill Jaede He might be able to find the information quietly for you Please contact him directly If you have any questions please feel free to contact us Regards SSpirakis Original Message From Williams Jason R Credit Sent Tuesday July PM To Bacon Philip Spirakis Spiro S Cc Ward Kim S Houston Subject BHP Copper Inc Philip and Spiro I am trying to do some research from a credit standpoint on BHP Copper Inc Kim Ward is an originator on the West Gas desk and has some potential deals pending but I have no information on this entity with respect to creditworthiness so I can not approve any deals at this point Kim contacted the BHP Billiton people and they recommended that we contact you as you transact with BHP Copper Inc on metals deals Do you have any financials for BHP Copper Inc as a distinct entity I would appreciate any insights that you might offer Please call me at if you have any questions Thanks Jay Williams
